            print("[INFO] Waiting for dashboard screen...")
            dashboard = None
            timeout = 30  # seconds

                    fallback_text="Dashboard"

            allure.attach("✅ Login success", name="Test Result", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

            screenshot_path = "screenshots/failed_login.png"
